# Zooplankton Classifications {.unnumbered}

There are multiple ways to classify zooplankton.

One of the most common is to classify by size, as:

-   Micro
-   Meso
-   Macro

## Zooplankton taxa

Classes of micro-zooplankton:

-   Branchiopoda

-   Maxillopoda

Our taxa of interest:

-   Branchiopoda:

    -   Cladocera

-   Maxillopoda:

    -   Copepoda

-   Rotifera (Phylum)

Grouping ID and culturing separate from each other
